page.title: 07Recreation in Wimbledon
page.content: In Wimbledon there are not many differrent recreational places to go.There are a lot of parks but most of them are all the same with a few swings and a slide,not forgetting the very large field on which people either walk their dogs or play football.The best park in the area is probably Wimbledon Park because it has most facilities .It has about 16 tennis courts,two putting greens of which one is pitch and putt.Wimbledon Park also has a boating lake and a running track with a stand so you can watch.The park also has its own large field for dog walking and a lot of park amusements for little kids,with the old favourites the swings and slide.Wimbledon Park is normally packed during the tennis championships but because it is large it can take the extra tourists.
